title: weapon mod(冲突）
author: tony300300
txt_content: 1.6.6weapon mod好像不能使用（装了大家最常用的modloader,village,工业）

replies.author: tony300300
replies.txt_content: 好像不止，我试过光是装了modloader再装weaponmod也是当机

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
搬運帖已更新Weaponmod v5.0

原帖中提到的注意事項也只有刪除 META-INF 而已...

replies.author: tony300300
replies.txt_content:
失败了（其他mod运行正常，请帮忙下载一个weapon专属modloader(在weaponmod zip里的readme写道了用另一个modloader)谢谢
readme写道：Backup your minecraft.jar
- Requires Risagumi's ModLoader, so first install that one.
- Then drag and drop all files into the root of minecraft.jar with a file browser like 7-Zip or WinRar.
- If you're using Xie's Hunger mod, install the file in the Xie's Hungermod patch-folder.
- Delete META-INF if you did not do that already.
- Move the properties file to the .minecraft folder. Edit it for disabling weapons and custom item id's.
- (Optional) Install the HD textures to put them in your texture pack in the right folders or add them to minecraft.jar.
- Enjoy!

失败了（其他mod运行正常，请帮忙下载一个weapon专属modloader(在weaponmod zip里的readme写道了用另一个modloader)谢谢
readme写道：Backup your minecraft.jar
- Requires Risagumi's ModLoader, so first install that one.
- Then drag and drop all files into the root of minecraft.jar with a file browser like 7-Zip or WinRar.
- If you're using Xie's Hunger mod, install the file in the Xie's Hungermod patch-folder.
- Delete META-INF if you did not do that already.
- Move the properties file to the .minecraft folder. Edit it for disabling weapons and custom item id's.
- (Optional) Install the HD textures to put them in your texture pack in the right folders or add them to minecraft.jar.
- Enjoy!

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-6-17 04:13 编辑 

ModLoader 指的就是 Risagumi's ModLoader ... 只此一家, 別無分號...

我已重新上傳更新過的 ModLoader Beta 1.6.6 ,你再試試看吧... 

另外 Weapon mod 已更新至 v5.1 ,我也一併上傳了...

請到搬運帖下載  http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5346-1-1.html
